summary.Title: Ship Mechanics Wanted
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for:

Ship Mechanics 

for marine industry in Denmark
Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Departme
summary.OccupationGroup: Maskinist-, dæks- og kommunikationsarbejde til søs

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for:

  • Ship Mechanics 

for marine industry in Denmark

Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Departments. 

Key tasks:

  • Install, repair, modify, or maintain diesel engines, fuel systems, hydraulic systems, electrical and electronics systems, and marine powertrains
  • Carry out maintenance, repair, and servicing of boats and other marine vessels
  • Replace or repair parts, using hand tools and power tools, including hoists, jacks, wrenches, and screwdrivers
  • Diagnose mechanical problems with electrical and electronic components, using electrical test equipment
  • Arrange for maintenance and repair of equipment, machinery, or mechanical devices

Skills:

  • English - must be able to communicate in English 
  • Knowledge of engine systems
  • Knowledge of boat systems and components
  • Knowledge of mechanical principles and their application to marine systems
  • Always attentive to detail and alert to ensure safety
  • Ability to receive and follow instructions and communicate with co-workers
  • Ability to read labels, safety warnings, and guidelines

Experience:

  • Experience from shipyards 
  • Education or professional experience in a given position

We offer you:

  • Job in Denmark 
  • Attractive salary 
  • 37 hours per week with possibilities for overtime
  • Flight tickets
  • Transport to/ from job 
  • Accommodation 
  • Rotation 6 - 12 months 
  • Safety courses
  • Work tools and clothes
  • Help with Work Permit/VISA 
  • Health insurance / Medical help
